name: list
description:
API Resellers
  • This endpoint does not support subaccounts and therefore API Resellers should not supply an X-Shopper-Id header

periodStart.description: Start of range indicating what time-frame should be returned. Inclusive

periodEnd.description: End of range indicating what time-frame should be returned. Inclusive

domain.description: Domain name to use as the filter of results

productGroupId.description: Product group id to use as the filter of results

paymentProfileId.description: Payment profile id to use as the filter of results

parentOrderId.description: Parent order id to use as the filter of results

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return

sort.description: Property name that will be used to sort results. '-' indicates descending

X-Shopper-Id.description:
Shopper ID to be operated on, if different from JWT
Reseller subaccounts are not supported

X-Market-Id.description: Unique identifier of the Market in which the request is happening

$ul: **orders**: A collection of orders
**pagination**
**first**: URI to access the first page
**last**: URI to access the last page
**next**: URI to access the next page
**previous**: URI to access the previous page
**total**: Number of records available
**code**: Short identifier for the error, suitable for indicating the specific error within client code
**fields**: List of the specific fields, and the errors found with their contents
**message**: Human-readable, English description of the error
